name: Climb Slimes
description:
CLIMB SLIMES You play as RED an aspiring astronaut with one dream: to go to the Moon. However, going to the Moon is no easy task... especially not for a person composed of 100% GOO. Without other options, RED must stack layers of their slime brethren in a race to the top! HOW TO PLAY Press ⬆️ ⬅️ ➡️ to move RED around and shoot for the stars! NOTE: stationery slimes are round, circular & easily attach to each other Falling slimes become droplets and become too skinny to connect to nearby goo walls CREDITS
  • Camden Pettijohn: Game/Level Design, Scripter & Pixel Art
  • Grant Gelardi: Game Design, Music, SFX, Pixel Art
THEME Made for the Davis Game Jam at GDAC with the theme of LAYERS.
